com.fluidops.ajax.components

Class FEditTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fluidops.ajax.components.FComponent
      • com.fluidops.ajax.components.FContainer
        • com.fluidops.ajax.components.FEditTable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FEventListener

    public class FEditTable
extends FContainer
    editable table 1) table 2) extra edit button in the first column to edit rows 3) cancel / save / delete buttons at the bottom of the table 4) form for editing / entering new row
    Author:
    aeb

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  FEditTable.EditTableModel
      table model that allows the table contents to be edited via the FEditTable
      static class  FEditTable.TableEditException
      exception when table is about to be edited (delete, add, edit row)
